function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor ventilation, pest infestations, and mold linked to respiratory conditions and poor health","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases and poor general health","Mitigation":"Improve housing conditions with proper ventilation and pest control","Technologies":"Improved ventilation systems, pest control methods","People":"Low-income populations and people of color","Owner":"Housing authorities, property owners"},{"Description":"Eviction and housing instability associated with comorbidities and mental health conditions","Impact":"Increased risk of mental and physical health conditions","Mitigation":"Address housing instability, provide mental health support, and prevent evictions","Technologies":"Social support programs, mental health services","People":"Individuals facing eviction, low-income populations","Owner":"Government agencies, community organizations"},{"Description":"High healthcare costs associated with eviction increasing the likelihood of future evictions","Impact":"Cyclical pattern of housing instability and poor health","Mitigation":"Provide affordable healthcare, address economic instability, and prevent future evictions","Technologies":"Healthcare subsidies, economic support programs","People":"Individuals facing eviction, low-income populations","Owner":"Healthcare providers, government agencies"}]}
